summary: All four requirements (REQ-49, REQ-50, REQ-51, REQ-52) are implemented in the diff. Message buttons have been added to CourseDirectory, ProfileDetailPage, and MapView pages. ChatPage now supports auto-selecting conversations via sessionStorage. However, there is a significant backend limitation: the match profiles do not include Principal IDs, which prevents proper navigation to specific user conversations. This is acknowledged in the code comments and an alert message, but the requirements are technically implemented with a workaround using sessionStorage.

hallucinated_features.description: Alert message in CourseDirectory noting backend limitations with missing Principal IDs
hallucinated_features.reason: The diff includes an Alert component in CourseDirectory.tsx mentioning that messaging functionality is currently limited due to backend not returning Principal IDs with member profiles. This user-facing alert was not requested in the BuildRequest.
